alert.note: Alert for Butler; Harvey; Marion; Sedgwick (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 31 at 7:43PM CDT until May 31 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM CDT FOR SEDGWICK...HARVEY...WESTERN BUTLER AND SOUTHERN MARION COUNTIES... At 743 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Peabody, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. This storm has a history of large hail. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Wichita, Derby, Newton, El Dorado, Andover, Haysville, Augusta, Park City, Valley Center, Bel Aire, Mulvane, Goddard, Rose Hill, Hesston, Maize, Hillsboro, Clearwater, Halstead, Marion and North Newton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
